website_summaries.verdict: Takes post-use cleaning to the next level with a self-sanitizing UV light.
pros: Includes all the premium perks: heated seat, warm air dryer, carbon filtering system, and a bright LED bowl light
Pulsing jets are a big hit, as they're effective without being too intense
Simple to set up and use
cons: Side control panel is a bit hard to see while sitting, and some users say the model needs a remote control

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful functionality.
customer_reviews.text: OK everyone knows why to buy one... The construction and operation of this seat is great. the hoses and fitting for install made the job a snap to retrofit my Kohler one piece Santa Rose toilet. I thought not having a remote might be missed, but the switch size and placement is perfect and the adjust-ability allows a wide range of personal settings. The drying blower is a nice assist and the air filter, something I thought was a gimmick really works. Not as comfortable as standard seat, but the cleaning function is so worth it. Read all the features, lighted, soft close lid etc it has it all.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Fits my k-3466 San Raphael elonglated.
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my k-3466 San Raphael elongated. I was so confused when I saw a company rep wrote in the Q&A section that it won’t fit the San Raphael while the Kohler website clearly stated it as compatible. I took the risk and ordered it. Very pleased with the purchase. The water pressure is a bit strong even on the lowest settings compared to a TOTO I used before, but some people may prefer stronger pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Gamgee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. I highly recommend this one
customer_reviews.text: I have tried this for almost two months and it is a life saver in the extremely cold weather in New England. I bout three different brands for all my my toilets: TOTO C100, Lotus ATS-2000 and this one. I bought two TOTO and am returning one of them unopened and buying Kohler 8298 C3 155 again for my other toilet. The blue light is cool and water temperature is just right. Plus it has the UV a which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Edan Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Your wife will love you for the Kohler C-3 bidgit seat..
customer_reviews.text: Love the warm seat, gentle rinse, and the heated air dry It is more for the wife, but I have pushed her off the seat a few times since we got the Kohler C3 155 I do wish the blue light was a soft green, Poor instructions on the different heat levels.. After having Brandon Hawkins run the dedicated line Actual placement of the seat was easy. I wish Amazon had a better comparison chart. Flex pay would be great... I spend a lot on Amazon And would spend even more
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kohler said it would work - WRONG!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a heated bidet seat for two of my 1985 Kohler San Rafael toilets. I found this seat on Amazon and called Kohler to find out two things. 1. Would this seat fit my toilet?, and 2. Did I really need 13.25" from the left hole in the toilet to the wall?(I only had 12.75") The answer from the rep at Kohler was a resounding NO on #1 and a YES on #2. I took a chance and ordered the seat anyway and guess what, the seats fit perfectly and work fine. My wife loves her new seat!
customer_reviews.author: Magic Mike

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre design from a great company.
customer_reviews.text: Likes - Automatic lighting / warm seat / water settings / height of the seat / self-cleaning / quite Dislikes - no remote / no presets / no child settings / slow response to control / you cannot change cleaning positions midstream (you need to turn off and turn on with desired setting) / poor design location of water line and power cable (it could have been recessed to the back a bit more like Bio Bidet or other Bidet for its price). Kids like this product but find it cumbersome to use compared to Bio-Bidet with remote and child settings.
customer_reviews.author: MichiganTeckie

customer_reviews.title: I feel pretty, O so pretty:)
customer_reviews.text: We initially bought a Brondell Swash 1400 based on amazon reviews but returned because it only worked one day. The Kohler was higher quality, simpler to use (no programming needed, just push a button), and costs less. I mistakenly ordered an elongated model for our round toilet but I’m glad I did. The longer seat gives men the extra room needed.
customer_reviews.author: joiwue

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: I bought this before all the covid mess so it was much cheaper than it is now. Great product, all the features (heated seat, adjustable front and back spraying, drying fan, night light, sanitizer) are fantastic. And it never smells like poop in our bathroom! Who wouldn't love that? It contains the smell quite well. Never had a bidet, wouldn't have a master bath without one now. Haha! Tempted to get one for my kids, but I'm worried they'll forget how to wipe properly. 😆
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great...
customer_reviews.text: Love it but the Toto is much better. Had to get this for a small elongated toilet. Works ok, but it doesn't seem to aim right. You have to wiggle yourself around to catch the stream, whereas with Toto it knows where to hit.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Haidar

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is made to do
customer_reviews.text: It's a Kohler. So are all the toilets, sinks and tubs in my house and all of them are 40 years old and still functioning and looking good. This bidet can't be reasonably compared to the old cast iron fixtures but because the same company put their name on it, I expect it will do as well as any other, probably better.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait for a pandemic???
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting one of these for a few years, and the Covid19 pandemic put this on top of my Amazon priority list. I installed it really quickly, and I love it! I feel so much cleaner than I did before when using TP as my only means of wiping up the mess. With or without a pandemic, this is a great item that every household needs.
customer_reviews.author: K. Tolbert

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I installed this yesterday after giving it to my wife for Easter. Installation took about 30 mins and this included the removal of the old seat and tubing. After one day she loves it. So many features and settings that allow this to be customized. This was also a fraction of the price of others that we reviewed while we were shopping around. After one day I asked her and she can't find a single thing to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: alyle55

customer_reviews.title: Good but response is slower
customer_reviews.text: I used Lotus before, but it is twice the price so I try this one , it has nice features with good value, however the response between the setting change is slow! If you are patient, you can buy this one, if not, go for Lotus.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny C

customer_reviews.title: A great bidet toilet seat but don't make my mistake!😃
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine for three weeks now and just love it! It's very good quality and worth every penny!! I had a little cheaper one and it was for a round toilet and it was ok but don't make the mistake I made don't put one on a round toilet! Spend the extra money and buy a elongated toilet and seat!!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Bumpers are cheap and poorly fit
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Bumpers are cheap and poorly fit. Known issue that has not been fixed. Everything else works well.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Howe

customer_reviews.title: Great prodyct
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine product. Works well, no big bunks tank but does take up a lot of seat (making it a round instead of elongated). The improvement I’d make is to have the water line self a downward angle, it sticks out a lot
customer_reviews.author: Martyjimbo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, very well put together with great features and self cleaning. Installation was easy however, almost all toilet fill valves are plastic and the connections on this product are metal. You can’t use plumbers tape and you have to be very careful when threading the connections.
customer_reviews.author: Lasalamandre

customer_reviews.title: High quality and works
customer_reviews.text: I've had this about a couple of months and it works well. Higher quality than many others that are available. Simple controls. Easy to install in just a few minutes. The fit on the Kohler toilet required minimal adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: G. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Nice full featured bidet seat
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money. Warm water, hot air dry, heated seat, uv stetilizer, etc. Controls on side, you can disable nightlight and noisy deoderizer. Valve fits most 3rd party t-shut off valves, included valve does not have a shutoff.
customer_reviews.author: SomeGuy

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is the most uncomfortable toilet seat I’ve ever sat on. The design forces the body to tilt forward, which is the worse posture for using the toilet. It is difficult to sit upright on this seat. Unfortunately the seat is non-returnable so I’m stuck with an expensive paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: expected more for the price
customer_reviews.text: expected more for the price. nothing works really well. updating to 2 stars as this has not met expectations. water isn’t heated right away, no settings are as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Juss

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great design, perfect size, does not take extra space , remote is easy to operate. I just needed extra outlet what was an additional cost. I would recommend it without reservation
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Wow! I want this bidet seat in every bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: The seat is comfortable and it was easy to install. The icons are self-explanatory too! Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MeandMibooks

customer_reviews.title: Flaws
customer_reviews.text: Initial burst of water always cold, seat heater doesn’t stay on in the dark, only when there is light in the room according to owners manual, which sucks because in the middle of the night the warm seat is always welcoming, my previous seat which was less money didn’t have these flaws I’m spoiled so returning this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Zulli

customer_reviews.title: Best Quarantine Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased early in the quarantine when the price was still low due to the toilet paper shortages. How have I survived so long without this???
customer_reviews.author: Brett Schaffer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install had everything I needed in the package! Love all the options
customer_reviews.author: billie j

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: tried many different brand of toilet seats and finds KOHLER is the best. love the odor filter and instant heated water. the seat is so comfortable and fit all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: King Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Must have fixture for every home
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and value. Install was easy, and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Calcinari

customer_reviews.title: The light
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these two Bidets that are suppose to be the same. One of them the light does not work. Please advise. Bijan Petri 4154970087
customer_reviews.author: bijan petri

customer_reviews.title: I’m not happy with it at all
customer_reviews.text: I have had 4 bidets by Kohler And this is my least favorite. It did not fit my elongated stool and the opening is so small it’s very uncomfortable. I’m not happy with it at all
customer_reviews.author: Carol Humphreys

customer_reviews.title: Constant warm water.
customer_reviews.text: Works better than my old Toto bidet. Cleans well and warm water never runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Blattner

customer_reviews.title: Some nice features.
customer_reviews.text: The heated seat is nice. I think the manual could do better explaining of some of the features but maybe practice makes perfect. I don’t think I’d buy this model again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you have a septic system this will help save it, use less paper and get cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely on our Kholer toilet, functions perfectly and you get cleaner with a fraction of the paper. Toilet paper is the worst thing that is acceptable to put in your septic system so your system will last longer with this Bidet. Also when else would it be acceptable to get poo on your skin and just smear it off with tissue?? No... you would wash it off of course, thats what this does.. its very civilized and environmentally sound to get this device. It warms the seat, has a blue nite light and warms the water... makes all other bathrooms seem more like an ancient outhouse to me now.
customer_reviews.author: Sean326

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product, but somewhat expensive.
customer_reviews.text: The bidet is very well made and has a ton of features. The bone color is quite expensive. The same unit in white is considerably cheaper. Highly recommend for comfort, features and ease of installation.
customer_reviews.author: E. Dietze

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a bidet, this one is just as good as any if not better. Lots of features and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: K. Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought this sooner. Don't Wait! Life Changer
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son and he loves it. He takes medication to keep his ammonia level down. Frequent trips to the toilet are now so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly, I've had this for a bit and finally got around to installing it. Installation is barely more difficult than just a regular toilet seat, just a T junction and a few tubes. As far as the seat/bidet itself, it's pretty great. I won't lie, the tank and mechanics make it odd to sit on for any extended period. The plastic is sort of cheap feeling, not the feel of painted wood or porcelain. But the bidet works well. It is warm and adjustable. Easy to use and effective. I won't get into too many details because...well..ew. But I think you will be happy. If there is one complaint, the dryer ain't great so plan on blotting with TP.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Erwin

customer_reviews.title: Future toilet
customer_reviews.text: Welcome to the future of toilets. OK, I guess there are some Japanese toilets out there that play sound effects and stuff. This one doesn't do that, but it does just about everything else. The installation is easy, although you will need a power outlet near your toilet which some people don't have. Once installed, the unit works right out of the box. No calibration or set up. Just get right to it. The build quality is excellent and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: You may want to bring some reading material into the bathroom with you to enjoy all the features...
customer_reviews.text: Even without the "cleansing" feature, the heated seat, UV and visible light would all be nice features on a toilet seat. I didn't realize what I was getting into with hooking up the hoses and such and my wife was a little apprehensive about the cleansing and drying features, but like I said it is a nice seat even if you don't use those features.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Post

customer_reviews.title: Works great, purchased for 2nd bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I have the c3-230 in my master which I like the remote control with a few extra features. I bought this one for my guest/second bathroom and I like it just as much! It has all the great features and the seat is very comfortable. I can't believe I lived without one of these for so long. Easy to install and the installation video online was extremely helpful. Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Heating element stopped working and shorts out the unit! Cold air dryer and limited wand movement
customer_reviews.text: Reduced to one star! Updated 4/10/2020: Heating element completely stopped working and entire unit shuts off! Worst bidet purchase ever!!! Do yourself a favor and Choose a different brand! The dryer is not warm. The wand has limited extension. Step daughter’s bathroom got the TOTO 4737 model. Much better than this one! Would not buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: MsChris

product_meta.title: KOHLER K-8298-0 C3 155 Elongated Warm Water Bidet Toilet Seat, White with Quiet-Close Lid and Seat, Automatic Deodorization, Self-Cleaning Wand, Adjustable Water Pressure, Nightlight, Heated Seat
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteBring the refreshing convenience of personal cleansing to your existing toilet. With a slim, low profile design that fits most elongated toilets, the C3 155 toilet seat uses soothing heated water to provide a higher level of cleansing and hygiene. A built in side panel is ergonomically designed for easy control of water temperature and spray, while the heated seat keeps you comfortable. A built in night light illuminates the bowl, and the self-cleaning stainless steel wand uses UV light for automatic sanitizing. Kohler Bidet Seats Overview Sleek and smart, a cleansing seat will elevate your daily routine. It’s an instant upgrade to any toilet with customizable amenities you might experience at a spa or in a luxury hotel, including warm water cleansing, heated toilet seat, nightlight and much more. Kohler Bidet Seats are designed to fit most toilets and our signature designs complement a range of decors. Smart toilets and bidet seats feature water cleansing as a refreshing alternative to toilet tissue alone. They give you complete control over the entire experience with intuitive controls. And they will leave you feeling confident, assured and cleaner than clean. Grip Tight bumpers hold seat firmly in place.Quick-Release™ functionality allows the seat to be removed quickly for easy cleaning.Quiet-Close™ functionality to prevent seat from slamming.
feature_bullets: Hybrid heater provides continuously heated water for consistent comfort
Heated seat with five temperature settings
Stainless steel wand with automatic UV light self-sanitization
LED lighting illuminates the bowl to serve as a night light
Adjustable water temperature and water pressure
Warm air drying system with adjustable air speed and temperature
Automatic deodorization with carbon filter for odor control
Requires connection to toilet water supply line. All hoses and connections are included. Requires Phillips screwdriver and adjustable wrench for installation
Dedicated electrical GFCI circuit required (120 Volt, 15A, 60Hz, 1800W)
Fits most elongated toilets, see Kohler compatibility chart for details

specifications.Included Components: Toilet Seat, Electrical cord, deodorizer block
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars123 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
